https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/vSfVrYiUMeriPWC710su8SjrN5W.jpg At 2 Ela lost her ability of seeing and hearing because of a severe illness. And then she became a total disappointment of her family due to her untamed behaviors. But everything changed after an unorthodox teacher stepped into their lives to educate Ela while healing himself. Benim Dünyam
